seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3 years experience required, title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, typical mid-level for BI/DW roles in India

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence', core responsibilities include ETL, reporting, visualization, and data integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, visualization, and ETL tools like DataStage, Informatica, ADF - all batch-oriented

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or people management; responsibilities are technical implementation and support

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure all mentioned as preferred experience, no single cloud emphasized

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major clouds listed as preferred experience, indicating multi-cloud exposure

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on BI/DW, reporting, and ETL tools (DataStage, Informatica, ADF) which are primarily batch-oriented

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory mentioned as preferred tool, which is cloud-native orchestration

storage_layer.evidence: BI/DW focus implies data warehouse architecture; Cognos reporting typically connects to data warehouses

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with onsite work model

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India (Pune, Maharashtra) with onsite requirement

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, India implies relocation may be required for non-residents

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, location restricted to India

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location in India with no mention of student visa support; likely requires local work authorization

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India with onsite requirement implies need for local work authorization, no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position in India typically implies W2 equivalent employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in job posting or extraction results

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career path mentioned, only general 'continuous improvement' and 'innovation' language

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with business and technical team members, suggesting collaboration with experienced colleagues

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks mentioned (IC, management, specialist, architect)

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-haves (Cognos, UNIX, 3+ years BI/DW) vs nice-to-haves (cloud platforms, ETL tools), balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on BI/DW reporting, visualization, and ETL with specific tool requirements (Cognos, DataStage, etc.)

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3 years experience required for mid-level BI/DW role with reasonable skill set (Cognos, ETL, UNIX)
